item.title: EMOTIONAL FREEDOM
item.description:
EMOTIONAL FREEDOM

(SE) is a form of therapy aimed at relieving and resolving the symptoms of

item.title: Was It Spinach That Popeye Reached for, or Beet Juice?
item.description:
Was It Spinach That Popeye Reached for, or Beet Juice?

A new study has emerged that may give hope to those who may see themselves as the proverbial "90-pound weakling." Surprisingly, the remedy can be found in the garden.

item.title: Smoking and Lung Cancer: It's Time to Kick Butts in 2016
item.description:
Smoking and Lung Cancer: It's Time to Kick Butts in 2016

Not even 100 years ago, it was the norm throughout society... and shockingly enough, doctors actually recommended it for improved health. But the tables have turned dramatically as far as public perception on smoking, which is now recognized as the number one cause of preventable disease and death in the United States.

item.title: Regenerative agriculture -- a solution to climate change | Ben Dobson | TEDxHudson
item.description:
Regenerative agriculture -- a solution to climate change | Ben Dobson | TEDxHudson

This talk was given at a local TEDx event, produced independently of the TED Conferences. What if we could reverse global warming with just one methodological shift? Can the way we farm radically impact not just our output but also overwhelming wide-ranging concerns for our environment, hunger, and poverty?

item.title: How Safe is an Airport Full Body Scanner?
item.description:
How Safe is an Airport Full Body Scanner?

"Step onto the body scanner platform and place your hands in the air; it's for your safety and security." If you've traveled through a U.S. airport within the past few years, you've probably had a government screener say something along these lines.

item.title: Trauma, Somatic Experiencing and Peter A. Levine PhD
item.description:
Trauma, Somatic Experiencing and Peter A. Levine PhD

Peter uses his famous "Slinky" presentation to demonstrate the effects of trauma on the nervous system, and his philosophy of treating trauma; which involves slowly releasing (or titrating) this compressed fight-or-flight energy a bit at time to give the individual the ability to reintegrate it back into their nervous system.

item.title: Emotional Freedom Technique (EFT) Demonstration
item.description:
Emotional Freedom Technique (EFT) Demonstration

http://eft.mercola.com/?x_cid=youtube EFT Practitioner of Dr. Mercola's Center for Natural Health Julie Schiffman shows a tool which can help in various aspects of life, it's called Emotional Freedom Technique (EFT) Technique also known as Tapping.

item.title: 9 Other Reasons to Eat More Fiber
item.description:
9 Other Reasons to Eat More Fiber

Even your great-grandmother knew fiber was the secret to keeping you "regular." But fiber has many other surprisingly powerful health benefits. Here are nine other excellent reasons to bulk up on fiber.

item.title: Lime Juice and 8 Other Natural Ways To Quit Smoking
item.description:
Lime Juice and 8 Other Natural Ways To Quit Smoking

Millions are helplessly addicted to tobacco, unaware that a natural aid for smoking cessation can be found not at the local pharmacy, but at your grocer's fruit stand.
